url.imageAlt: A street view of 737 Ouellette Avenue
An empty indoor pool with the words “Shallow Area” printed around the lip
A public bathroom and shower area with a sauna attached
An empty apartment with cream walls, wooden flooring, and sliding door access to a balcony
A kitchen & dining room with a large wooden dining table and chairs in the middle
An apartment gym area fitted with treadmills, stationary bikes, and other various workout machines
A small kitchen with white walls, cupboards, and appliances
A street view of 737 Ouellette Avenue looking up at the apartment
Another picture of the empty indoor pool showcasing its shallow and deep ends
A spacious apartment laundry room with machines lining the walls and folding tables in the centre

description: This was the site of the 1975 murder of John Henderson.
